Title: McFarland, USA
Writer: Christopher Cleveland (screenplay), Bettina Gilois (screenplay), Grant Thompson (screenplay), Christopher Cleveland (story), Bettina Gilois (story)
Actors: Kevin Costner, Ramiro Rodriguez, Carlos Pratts, Johnny Ortiz
Plot: Jim White moves his family after losing his last job as a football coach, and at his new school he turns seven disappointing students into one of the best cross-country teams in the region.
